name: European Confederation of Pharmaceutical Entrepreneurs
membership: EUCOPE's membership is listed on this webpage: http://www.eucope.org/en/eucope-members/
goal: EUCOPE promotes companies and associations active in the research and development, production and distribution of pharmaceutical products and furthers their scientific, technical, economic and legal objectives.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives:
Delegated Acts on the Falsified Medicines Directive
EU Database of the new Clinical Trials Regulation (EU) No. 536/2014
New Regulation on Medical Devices / In-vitro Medical Devices
